sentences: Ei tea oma asukoha täpset koordinaate.
Pakkusin tal endise asukoha juures peatuda.
Linnas on palju häid eluasemeid erinevates asukohtades.
context: The word 'asukoha' is a genitive form of the noun 'asukoht', meaning 'location'. It indicates where something or someone is situated. In Estonian, this form typically shows possession or relationship to another noun - in this case, it means 'of location' or related to location.
